members.name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.characteristic
members.description: Returns the BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic this descriptor belongs to.

members.name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.uuid
members.description: Returns the UUID of the characteristic descriptor, for example '00002902-0000-1000-8000-00805f9b34fb' for theClient Characteristic Configuration descriptor.

members.name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.value
members.description: Returns the currently cached descriptor value. This value gets updated when the value of the descriptor is read.

members.name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.readValue()
members.description: Returns a Promise that resolves to an ArrayBuffer holding a duplicate  of the value property if it is available and supported. Otherwise it throws an error.

members.name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.writeValue()
members.description: Sets the value property to the bytes contained in an ArrayBuffer and returns a Promise.

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: Sets the value with the bytes contained in the array.
